itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Mat Best discuss Mat's upcoming schedule for his book tour for "Thank For My Service", why we want Chris Pratt to play Mat in the movie, the exact science of boob jobs, and why Kelly McGillis won't be in the new Top Gun.
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Mat Best discuss Mat's upcoming schedule for his book tour for "Thank For My Service", why we want Chris Pratt to play Mat in the movie, the exact science of boob jobs, and why Kelly McGillis won't be in the new Top Gun.
